title: Interpretation of drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: What is the interpretation of drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail? This is what we will answer in this article. Milk is considered one of the most natural drinks that contain nutrients for health and the body, and no person can grow normally without constantly drinking milk. It contains vitamins and calcium that help in growth and protection from many diseases. He dreams of drinking milk for him. Specific meanings differ whether the milk itself is hot or cold, and there are those who see in their dream that they are drinking milk and do not know what their vision indicates, and in this article in the encyclopedia we will present the interpretation of the dream of drinking milk in a dream. Interpretation of drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin, from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Sirin Dreaming about milk is a sign that the dreamer enjoys a lot of food. If a person dreams that he is drinking milk, this means that he is in good health in reality. Whoever dreams that he is drinking milk mixed with sugar, the dream indicates that there are joys on his way to him and it may mean that he will succeed and be successful in his work. To dream that you are drinking a large amount of milk means that God Almighty will grant the dreamer great wealth or a distinguished position. Drinking milk in a dream may indicate an increase in the dreamer’s livelihood and money. One of the unpleasant dreams is the dream of spilling milk, because it is a sign that the dreamer is losing his money and business. As for drinking spoiled milk in a dream, this means that the dreamer feels lost and it may symbolize that he bears responsibility for those around him in reality. Whoever dreams of drinking milk and then distributing it to his relatives and neighbors, this indicates that he will suffer a small loss in his livelihood. Drinking cold milk in The dream indicates that the visionary enjoys stability in his work and life. If a person dreams that he is eating milk mixed with bananas, this means that he suffers from conflicting thoughts and a feeling of confusion. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking warm milk, his dream indicates that he will win a competition in which he participates. A dream about a child drinking milk indicates that this child is maturing in reality. Seeing a single woman drinking milk in a dream. An unmarried woman who dreams that she is drinking milk is considered a good dream, because it means that she will hear good news soon. The dream may indicate the dreamer’s salvation from her worries and problems. As for Whoever sees in her dream that she is taking milk from someone to drink it, the dream indicates that she will soon obtain a great livelihood, whether it is money or marriage. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying milk, this means that she will succeed in her studies. To dream that she is deliberately spilling milk On earth, it indicates that the dreamer is wasting her life in useless ways. Seeing a married woman drinking milk in a dream. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking milk, this is good news that God Almighty will repent of her and forgive her sins. A married woman drinking coffee in a dream may symbolize that she is famous. With her good behavior among people, it may represent her imminent pregnancy. As for the one who buys milk in her dream, she will enjoy happiness and stability in her family life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is watering milk for someone she knows, this symbolizes that she bears a responsibility.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying in a dream

preview.html: Seeing buying in a dream means that you are pursuing something and achieving it, whether it is good or bad. According to what the fortune teller buys, buying and selling in a dream are symbols of trade. As for seeing buying in a dream, it means profits and benefits. Seeing that he is about to buy in a dream indicates the viewer's quest to earn a living. This is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing buying in a dream. Interpretation of seeing buying in a dream Seeing yourself buying in a dream indicates a disturbance in something. If the dreamer sees that he can buy, this indicates his success and obtaining the thing he desires. Interpretation of seeing buying in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees that she wants to buy something with little money, this indicates the disappointment she lives in. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is buying expensive things, this indicates that she will succeed in her life. If an unmarried girl dreams of her desire to buy food, this indicates psychological introversion. But if he sees that he wants to buy food in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of desires. But if he wants to buy expensive food, this indicates prosperity in all cases. Interpretation of buying a married woman in a dream If he sees in a dream that a married woman is buying delicious food, this indicates what that woman wants. But if she sees that she is buying a lot of food in the markets and has money, this indicates that she will live a period of prosperity. But if a married woman sees herself buying expensive things, this indicates that all the reasons for success are available to her. Interpretation of seeing buying in a dream ManBut if a person sees in his dream that he is buying, this indicates that he will get something he wants. But if he sees that he wants to buy expensive things and he does not have money, this indicates that he will face some difficulties. But if he dreams of buying a slave girl from the market, this indicates that he will have some options in life. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman shopping in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman buying, this indicates kindness and food for her and her child. If a pregnant woman sees that she wants to buy a house or a car, this indicates her success in life. But if a pregnant woman sees that she is buying food in a dream, this indicates that she was longing for it. If he sees himself wandering in a mall, this indicates that he will get an abundance of goods. Interpretation of seeing a young man buying in a dream If a young man sees that he is wandering and buying, this indicates that he will satisfy his desires. If you see a young man buying in a dream, this indicates ability and abundant profits. If a young man wants to buy a car or a house in his dream, this indicates the seriousness of his relationship. In conclusion, we told you the interpretation of seeing you buy in a dream in detail, we hope that you like the article.

title: Interpretation of a bathroom in a dream for a single girl

preview.html: Seeing a dove in a dream for an unmarried girl. A dream of many doves and a small dove for a married woman. For a pregnant woman. For a divorced woman. For a man slaughtering a bird. Holding a black and white dove. Ibn Sirin and others. A dove in a dream indicates friendship and honesty, as the dove is famous for these good qualities, and the bird is an honest messenger. It is also evidence of Loyalty to a loyal wife who loves her husband, as the dove indicates. The woman who has many children, today we will remind you of seeing a dove in a dream for a woman, a man, and a girl..Interpretation of a dove in a dream. As I mentioned at the beginning of the article, the dove symbolizes to a large extent in a single woman’s dream of marriage, while a single or small dove is a symbol of courtship or acquaintance. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a dove standing on her shoulder, this is evidence of marriage or engagement soon with a good man who fears God and will live a happy and stable life with him. She obtained high grades in her studies, but if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating pigeons, this is evidence that her desire will soon be fulfilled, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of pigeons in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman dreams that her husband is collecting pigeons and presenting them to her, and she and her husband are eating From this pigeon, this is a sign of pregnancy soon and a male will be born and this child will be among the righteous. Father, this is evidence of goodness and blessing in the life of this family. If she sees a black dove, this is evidence of her great status and that of her husband. Religion and God are Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of doves in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a married woman dreams of seeing many doves entering her house, this is evidence of an easy and affordable birth, and that she will give birth to a male child, and this birth will be fair and uplifting. The situation is in the future, and if a pregnant woman sees in a dream a white dove flying over her head, this is evidence of the goodness and happiness that is on her way soon, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is taking the bathroom, this is evidence of premature birth, and I will give birth to a baby girl, And she will be fair to her mother, and she and the mother will be in good health after giving birth, and God is Great. He knows best.Interpretation of pigeons in a divorced woman’s dream: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that pigeons entered her house and were constantly fluttering around the house, then this is evidence of marriage soon to a God-fearing person who has a lot of money and will live with him with stability and love. Victory over those close to you, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she sees a large dove standing at the door of the house, this is evidence of the good news that is on her way, and God is Most High. And He knows best. Interpretation of pigeons in a man’s dream: If a man sees in a dream that he is eating pigeons, this is evidence that there will be a lot of legal money soon. By hunting pigeons, this is evidence of happiness and pleasure in the coming days, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dove in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand for a married woman, a single woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand Many women are looking for an interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand, because henna is one of the cosmetics that women use for decoration, and a man can put some of it on the wedding day, and seeing it in a dream is one of the things that makes some people happy and worries others. What is henna? Henna is considered one of the cosmetic materials that have spread widely since ancient times, and it has been invented at the present time in different ways and uses that are not limited to putting it on occasions, but at any time, and there are those who ask about itInterpretation of a dream about henna on the hand, and the site is differentIt will provide a lot of explanation on this topic. Henna is not only applied to the hands and feet, but now it can be used and applied to any part of the body as desired. Henna has become available in all beauty centers and is not limited to a specific place in which it is located. All these advantages that henna is used for have prompted some to say that the presence of henna in a dream may mean that there is good from evil. Henna is also one of the things that are not prohibited and can be applied at any time, not just for cosmetic purposes. Henna means freedom from problems, worries, anxiety and any obstacle that a person may face. The best interpretation of the appearance of henna In a dream, it is a person's commitment, the strength of his faith, and the acceptance of his repentance from God, and it is known that women exploit it more. Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is one of the best interpreters of dreams in all of history, and many people are convinced of his dream interpretations, and now we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about henna. Ibn Sirin says that seeing henna in a dream means the collapse of anxiety and anxiety. Seeing henna in a dream also indicates good morals and justice for this person. Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a single woman If the girl is single and sees henna in her dream, it can arouse feelings of joy and happiness in her and make her search for it. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand For individuals, we will learn this from the following. When an unmarried girl sees henna in her dream, this means that there is good news on her way and she will achieve what she wants and has been striving for for a long time. If an unmarried girl sees herself standing on her feet with a henna tattoo, this means that she will marry soon and will be very happy after her marriage. When she sees a henna painting in a dream for an unmarried girl, this is an interpretation of her death from anxiety and distress and that great happiness comes to her, and it also indicates a good condition To put it. Interpretation of a dream about henna for a pregnant woman Many pregnant women believe that any dream she sees in her dream can reflect her pregnancy, and when she sees henna in a dream, she searches for an interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand for pregnant women. We will meet it. Some commentators say that if a pregnant woman sees that her head is covered with a lot of henna, this means that she will give birth to a boy. A pregnant woman who sees henna in her dream indicates that her birth will be very easy and that she and her child's health will be better. When a pregnant woman dreams of henna on her hand, this indicates the marital happiness she lives as well as her happiness with the newborn. Read also:

title: Interpretation of dreams I have a lot of money for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I have a lot of money for single and married women, and getting a lot of money is one of the dreams that most people want to achieve. Getting money is the main goal of many people who work for them and try and think about how to get it. Knowing that you get a lot of money in a dream from the beautiful dreams that promise goodness and food, in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream that has a lot of money for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream to see that he has a lot of money Ibn Sirin said that a lot of money and money in a dream indicates goodness and life and the removal of distress and worry, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that he throws money from his house and another takes this money, this is evidence that the owner of the dream suffered from some problems and worries, but God saved him from them. And whoever sees in his dream that he found money somewhere, this is evidence that the owner of the vision will face some small problems in his life, but they will end quickly and will enter joy and happiness, God willing. A gold coin has good and great news in a dream of goodness and life from God. And whoever sees in his dream that he is saving and saving money, this indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with great wealth from God and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of seeing I have a lot of money in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he has a lot of money and money, this means that the dreamer will succeed in his field of work and God will give him a lot of money. It also indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a beautiful newborn who will be a face of goodness for them and God I know. Interpretation of a dream about seeing money for a single girl Money for a single girl is evidence that this girl feels fear, anxiety and discomfort. If a girl dreams of paper money in a dream, this is a sign that she will marry a wealthy man or that she will get something valuable such as a new house or a piece of gold. And whoever sees in her dream that she is getting coins, this is undesirable and a sign of some problems and difficulties with relatives. As for seeing that she lost her bag, this is evidence that this girl is wasting valuable opportunities, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lot of money for a married woman A lot of money for a married woman in a dream indicates that this woman is going through a financial crisis and wants money. And whoever sees that she has money for legal ruqyah, this is evidence of that woman’s faith in God’s will for her. Silver money for a married woman indicates the livelihood of girls. Gold money for a married woman indicates good nutrition. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lot of money in a dream for a pregnant woman A lot of money in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the good that will come to her. Coins for a pregnant woman indicate the emergence of some problems and troubles during the birth process. The note indicates a blessed birth for the dreamer and she will have a healthy and handsome son, God willing. It is a sign that something happy will happen soon, such as marriage and Hajj, God willing, and that the dreamer will

title: Interpretation of a dream about date cake and a vision of eating regular dates

preview.html: Interpretation of date cake for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, to eat dates, to prepare cakes and cakes according to Ibn Sirin and more. If someone dreams of eating regular dates, it means that he heard a supplication and he is performing his supplication, and God knows best. Seeing cakes in a dream is a good vision, as it is a symbol of holidays and happy occasions. And joy.Interpretation of a cake in one dream: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is making cakes alone at home, this is evidence of a happy marriage to a wealthy person, and this girl will live with him in stability and happiness, God willing. She, by God, is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a cake in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is selling cakes in a store and selling them in large quantities to people, this is evidence of the kindness and strength of this lady soon. Interpretation of a cake in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating cakes She does not feel full, as this is evidence of a natural birth and that she will give birth to a girl of wonderful beauty who will dazzle everyone, God willing. If this woman gives birth to a boy, God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a cake in a divorced woman’s dream: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is making cakes and then distributing them to children in the streets, this is evidence that this woman will soon marry a good, God-fearing husband and live with him in stability and happiness. God willing, and if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is eating cake, this is evidence that the absent person will return soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a cake in a dream for a manIf a man sees in a dream that he is making cakes and selling them, this is evidence of nourishment and kindness soon for this person. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing flying in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing yourself flying in a dream The vision of flying is one of those strange visions that also has strange connotations. Flying has always been the greatest dream of the human race, and this dream was fulfilled by building airplanes, but man can see himself flying. The importance of this? How important is flight media visibility? This vision has many repercussions that we will mention in detail with all its cases. Learn about the interpretation of seeing flying in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Flying in a dream. Seeing flying in a dream expresses great desires, ambitions, and desires that one is desperately forced to satisfy. This vision is a reflection of the aspiration for construction and self-reliance. , to gain freedom and move away from the environment in which a person lives. If one sees that he is flying, it symbolizes many changes that are occurring in his life and the important developments that he sees in the current stage, which paves the way for another stage of his life. And if he sees that he is flying from one place to another Another, this indicates his transition from one country to another, and this also expresses a high position, a high position, and many fruits. As for the sick person, flying indicates the approaching condition of his condition - and this is what Al-Nabulsi went on. If a person’s desire is to fly and he sees that he is flying, then this symbolizes abundant goodness and nourishment. Abundant wealth and achieving many goals. Whoever is rich, this vision indicates that there is movement in his life between residence and permanent travel, so there is no room for stability or comfort. Interpretation of flying in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing flying in a dream indicates many desires and desires that a person works hard on. To achieve it. This vision is an indication that his dreams are coming true. If a person sees himself flying from one house to another, this may symbolize his separation from his wife or his divorce from her and his readiness to marry another woman. The dream of flying expresses constant movement and travel, and the many ways in which he walks The dreamer, and the continuous movement that his life lacks. And whoever sees that he flies until he reaches his destination and then returns to the ground again, this indicates achieving the goal of the journey, achieving the desired goal, and reaching the destination. The vision of flying also indicates the rise, state, and radical transformations that occur in a person’s life, Which prompts him to rise and reach the goal. If the person is afraid of flying, this indicates useless work or effort without benefit, and the vision may be a reflection of a psychological state limited to the fear of flying. If the dreamer is poor, this symbolizes his many desires and desires that He would like to satisfy it. Flying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin continues in his interpretation of the vision of flying, that this vision indicates a person who has many desires and dreams and always strives to achieve his goals and aspirations, regardless of the obstacles. But if the monarch sees that he is flying quickly and cannot return, this indicates On permanent travel or the approaching period and end of life. A vision of a journey is an indication of a journey and the achievement of the purpose of that journey. Whoever the trader is, this vision indicates

title: Interpretation of dreams for someone who gave me 50 dinars

preview.html: Most interpreters believe that numbers in a dream give a mysterious meaning, so today through gptafser.com/ we will present the interpretation of seeing someone giving me in detail 50 dinars for a man and a woman.Interpretation of seeing someone giving me 50 dinars in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the number 50, especially In a dream, it is on a dinar coin. It is a sure sign of following an extensive diet that you will have in the near future, and God knows best. The vision also indicates good luck for the dreamer and prosperity in her life, and God knows best. The unmarried girl saw the number 50 in a dream and it was on the coin in the dream. This indicates The dream indicates a lot of joy and radical change that will make her life better than it is. But if an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the 50th dinar in a dream, and it is destroyed in the dream. It is an indication of the problems that the dreamer falls into and is unable to solve, and God knows best. In the event that she sees For an unmarried girl in a dream, someone gives her 50 dinars and she was young. She has good fortune to marry an artistic man and that will be the reason for her great happiness, and God knows best. But when an unmarried girl receives fifty dinars that are forged in a dream, it is a sign of deception of the banner and deception of those close to her heart, and God knows best. I know. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will receive a large inheritance that he did not know anything about before, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving dead banknotes. Interpretation of seeing someone giving me 50 dinars in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams of giving her husband 50 dinars. Meaning On her intense love for her husband and that she cannot live without him, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that her husband gave her 50 dinars in a dream, this dream symbolizes the husband’s love for her and shows that he takes care of her requests and the house, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman giving her children 50 dinars in a dream and they were They are happy with that. A sample of the happiness that her children enjoy in her life. Perhaps it indicates the dreamer’s complete care for his children, and God knows best. As for a married woman who dreams of seeing 50 dinars cut in a dream. This dream symbolizes the emergence of a major psychological crisis in the dreamer’s life, but God Almighty will help her. To get out of it. Interpretation of seeing someone giving me 50 dinars in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is selling 50 dinars in a dream in a large number. This means that the dreamer will obtain in his life a lot of goodness and blessings, and God knows best. As for the man who sees himself in his dream giving his wife Fifty dinars. This indicates his love and loyalty to his wife and that his relationship with her is full of love and understanding, and God knows best. But seeing counterfeit money in a man’s dream is a sign of deception, deceit, or hypocrisy that the dreamer distinguishes, and he must change himself, and God knows best. An amount of The money is worth 50 dinars and has perished. A sign that the fortuneteller is suffering from major financial problems and has accumulated debts, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing someone who gave me 50 dinars in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation. A pregnant woman sees someone giving her 50 dinars in a dream. A metaphor for tremendous livelihood for her and her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a white car

preview.html: It also indicates great success and success in work and personal life, and today we will talk on our website gptafser.com/ about everything related to the interpretation of the dream of buying a white car. Interpretation of seeing a white car in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying a white car. This may be interpreted as He does his best to prevent the car from damage, accidents, or breakdown. He also discusses what could happen if a single woman sees that she is constantly trying to save money to satisfy her constant desire to own a white car. This suggests that she will soon graduate with honors and great appreciation for her academic achievements, and God knows best. In addition, In addition, other interpretations apply when an unmarried young woman sees a white car in her dream and tries to buy it but does not succeed. This indicates that this young woman will face many problems in her life. But he will quickly get rid of these things if he approaches Almighty God. And the only girl who She buys herself a white car with her own money. It portends her an upcoming marriage and she will feel happy for it. See also: Interpretation of dreams about buying a black car. Interpretation of seeing a married woman buying a white car in a dream. The meaning of seeing a married woman buying a white car in a dream. It also discusses what it means when a married woman sees in a dream That her husband gave her a large sum of money to buy a white car in perfect condition. If a married woman sees a dream, she gets a white car and registers it in the names of her children. This shows that this romantic married woman is always thinking about how to protect her children and protect them from the dangers of time. The married woman The happy woman who has a dream in which she buys a modest white car with her own money. This indicates that there will soon be a wedding within the family. The meaning of seeing a white car in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Buying a white car in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that childbirth will be easy, according to God Almighty’s command. As It has a second interpretation, which is that she will give birth to healthy, righteous offspring. It also explains that it is possible for her husband’s situation to change and be better than before in his personal and social life. Read also: Buying a new car in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying a white car for a man and its meaningIf someone sees in his dream He buys a big car. It indicates that he will promote the currency and God knows best. The car is white and exquisite in form and function and it takes a lot of effort to decorate it with decorations. This indicates that the dreamer is very happy and satisfied with his life. It also explains what to do if the dreamer sees himself looking for a white car In a dream to buy it, and searches for the desired shape and color with great effort, but to no avail. It indicates that the dreamer’s life will be disturbed by something. This may cause him great anxiety in his later years. When a man sees in a dream that he is buying a small white car, and he loved it He decorated it a lot and made it very beautiful. This indicates that the dreamer will get a new job and it will bring him great happiness. The man who dreamed that he looked at many cars displayed at the car showroom and drove

title: Interpretation of a dream about a balcony according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the balcony in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, either appearance, cleaning, washing, a glass, falling from the balcony, people appearing from the balcony, for Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and more. The balcony in a dream is one of the strange dreams that we see in a dream and causes a lot of confusion and anxiety for the dreamer, as the balcony is one of the things in our home and many people like to stand on it. Row. To get a lot of comfort and other important things, and seeing the balcony in a dream a lot. Important and different interpretations that the dreamer must know appear in many forms. Interpretation of the balcony in a dream If the balcony is high, it indicates the president, ruler or influential person If its fence is not high, it indicates a normal person or servants and followers Seeing a balcony at night in a dream means money and improving the situation Seeing a balcony may indicate the person who takes care of you and protects you and may indicate weapons and ammunition If you see a balcony in a dream, this indicates new fears and obligations, and the future will be very unstable with you If a girl dreams that she is on a balcony with her lover, she will be afraid of the intentions and thoughts of those who live around her. And if you dream that you are building a balcony, you will gain support, and you will receive new work and tasks If lovers dream that they are saying goodbye sadly on the balcony, this dream may be followed by a long and perhaps final separation The balcony also shows unpleasant news about absent friends. Imam Ibn Sirin, the famous and worldly interpreter of dreams, explained to us in his various interpretations the many and different meanings of seeing the balcony, which a person must be fully aware of in order to obtain its correct interpretation in all its different forms. And meanings. Interpretation of the balcony in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees that he is on the balcony in a dream, which is located in the middle of the city, is evidence of a person's exposure to a lack of faith and honesty in life. The presence of a person on the city balcony is evidence of the problems and troubles that he will face. Seeing the balcony beautifully in a dream is evidence of the need for caution and care in dealing. The collapse of the balcony in a dream indicates that someone close to you will fall into a trap. Falling from the balcony in a dream means that you will fall into a great disappointment. Seeing someone saying goodbye to someone in a dream from the balcony is evidence of a separation between you and the person in life. Seeing the balcony in a dream full of flowers is a sign of honor. Seeing a balcony full of rumors in a dream is evidence of a great competition in life. Seeing the balcony in a dream indicates the dreamer's future vision. Seeing the balcony in a dream is evidence that the person will be exposed to an accident in the near future. The presence of a person inside the balcony with someone other than your gender is evidence of warning you against gossip. Seeing a person standing alone on the balcony in a dream indicates success and the future. But seeing someone on the balcony in a dream is evidence of That a person watches people in all their actions. Seeing a lover standing on the balcony in a dream is evidence
